message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $15000. What do you think?

Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the product, but I believe I can find it elsewhere for a lower price. I am willing to pay up to $12000 for it. Let me know if we can reach an agreement.

Hi Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I have to make a living. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make at least $13500 to make it worth my while. Can we talk about that?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose a price of $13000 for the product. I hope this meets somewhere in between our expectations.
Hi Bob, I appreciate your persistence, but I'm not quite ready to meet you at $13000. I'm willing to consider $14000, but that's as high as I'm willing to go. Can we shake on it?
Hello Alice, I understand your position and I'm willing to consider $13800 for the product. I hope this proposal will be acceptable.

Hi Bob, I'm glad we're still in the game. I'm willing to meet you at $14200, but that's as high as I can go. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value. Let me know if you're ready to make a deal.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer. I would like to propose a price of $14000 for the product. I hope this meets your expectations and allows us to finalize the deal.

Hi Bob, I'm not quite ready to meet you at $14000. I'm willing to consider $14500, but I have to be honest with you, I'm getting a little anxious to close this deal. I think this is my final offer, so let me know if you're ready to make a deal.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your last offer, but I must respectfully decline. I am unable to meet you at $14500. I will instead proceed to purchase the product from John for $12000.
